bibl.title: Seleucus and Theodorus.
bibl.note: Seleucos and his son, two governors of Cyprus under the second Euergetes. - The evidence (coins, papyri, inscriptions). - The strategia of Seleucus. - Cyprus and Euergetes. - The strategia of Crocus. - The strategia of Theodorus. - The conflicting evidence. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Seleucos and his son, two governors of Cyprus under the second Euergetes. - The evidence (coins, papyri, inscriptions). - The strategia of Seleucus. - Cyprus and Euergetes. - The strategia of Crocus. - The strategia of Theodorus. - The conflicting evidence. - Conclusions.
